mapper.insert: insert into apply (apply_user_id, apply_time, apply_note) VALUES (#{userId}, #{time}, #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update apply, user set apply.apply_handler_id = #{handlerId}, apply.apply_handler_time = #{handleTime}, apply.apply_state = 2, apply.apply_handle_note = #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user.user_type = 3 where apply_id = #{id} and apply.apply_user_id = user.user_id and apply_state = 1
update apply set apply_state = 3, apply_handler_time = #{handleTime}, apply_handler_id = #{handlerId}, apply_handle_note = #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where apply_id = #{id} and apply_state = 1
mapper.select: select * from apply where apply_state = 2 or apply_state = 3
